alert.note: Alert for Clackamas (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:52PM PDT until June 02 at 5:15PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Portland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clackamas County in northwestern Oregon... * Until 515 PM PDT. * At 452 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Warm Springs Reservation, or 15 miles south of Government Camp, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Clackamas County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
